DOC.brief_summary: A Single-arm Phase II Trial Investigating the Efficacy and Safety of Zalutumumab in Patients with Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer who have Progressive Disease after Treatment with Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors.
DOC.brief_title: Zalutumumab in Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) Patients Refractory to Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors
DOC.criteria: Patients must have documented disease progression after TKI treatment (verified by CT scan and/or MRI according to RECIST). Estimated life expectancy of less than 3 months. Received the following treatments within 2 weeks prior to Visit 2: Cytotoxic or cytostatic anticancer chemotherapy Total resection or irradiation of the target lesion Any investigational agent
